application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.49 (T4765) Lime - Crown lift to 5m from ground level.T.54 (T4766) Sycamore - Remove one upper branch which is squirrel damaged to branch collar. T.2 (T1215) Horse Chestnut - Reduce canopy by 3m to suitable growth points and crown lift to 3m from ground level over footpath & 5m over road.
